All rights reserved. @@ -85,2 +85,2 @@ - * Note the exponent range of decimal32 is not used for - * rounding. + * Note the exponent range of decimal32 (min exponent of -95, max + * exponent of 96) is not used for rounding. @@ -95,2 +95,2 @@ - * Note the exponent range of decimal64 is not used for - * rounding. + * Note the exponent range of decimal64 (min exponent of -383, max + * exponent of 384) is not used for rounding. @@ -105,2 +105,2 @@ - * Note the exponent range of decimal64 is not used for - * rounding. + * Note the exponent range of decimal128 (min exponent of -6143, + * max exponent of 6144) is not used for rounding.
